Summary: NUS-ISS is offering a part-time job opportunity for students to work as an IT Technical Support Staff for $12/hr. The job involves performing daily morning checks on AV equipment, troubleshooting technical issues, conducting equipment upkeep and inventory checks, and supporting software installation. Applicants should have technical experience in AV equipment, multimedia, desktops, Macbooks, mobile devices, and network access. The application deadline is August 25, 2023.
